articles.author: Nathan Jolly
articles.title: Nintendo Blames Suez Canal Blockage For Switch Shortages – channelnews - ChannelNews
articles.description: It seems that even Mario couldn’t leap over the tanker that was blocking the Suez Canal, as Nintendo report that the accident was responsible for shortage of its Switch in Europe. In a recent financial results conference call, Nintendo President Shuntaro Furu…
articles.content:
It seems that even Mario couldn’t leap over the tanker that was blocking the Suez Canal, as Nintendo report that the accident was responsible for shortage of its Switch in Europe.

articles.title: MG reveals unhinged touring car racer for the road - NZ Autocar
articles.description: While it might not be so known here, over in Europe MG has a bit of a reputation in the world of touring cars.
